com.sun.pdfview.decrypt

类 UnsupportedEncryptionException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.sun.pdfview.decrypt.UnsupportedEncryptionException
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    EncryptionUnsupportedByPlatformException, EncryptionUnsupportedByProductException

    public abstract class UnsupportedEncryptionException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Identifies that the specified encryption mechanism is not supported by this product or platform.
    作者:
    Luke Kirby
    另请参阅:
    EncryptionUnsupportedByPlatformException, EncryptionUnsupportedByProductException, 序列化表格
